message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that holds significant value, and I believe it could be a game-changer for your business. While I can't disclose the specifics right now, I assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.  This is a chance to acquire something truly special, and I'm confident you'll see the immense potential it holds. Let me know your thoughts!
